Constructor Detail

JarFileUtilities

public JarFileUtilities()
Method Detail

getAllJarFilesFromPath

public static java.io.File[] getAllJarFilesFromPath(java.lang.String pathname)
This method extracts all jar files (files ending on ".jar") inside the given directory. If any errors occurs the method logs the error and returns null.

Parameters:
pathname - the directory to scan for jar files.
Returns:
array with all jar files in the given directory or null if an error occurred.

convertFilesToUrls

public static java.net.URL[] convertFilesToUrls(java.io.File[] files)
This method takes an array of files and converts it into an array of Urls. This is can be used to instantiate an URLClassLoader for example. If any error occurs this method logs the error and returns null instead of an array.

Parameters:
files - the files to convert to Urls.
Returns:
array with all Urls belonging to the given files or null if an error occured.
